channel.title: Interface. sendFrame126 issue?
channel.description:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/oga0hs.png[/img]
As you can see in the above image, there are multiple lines on each section of the interface.
I found the ID to change that section
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2dc7ead.png[/img]
But how do I make it carry on to the other lines like the one in the top right corner? Is there a certain method that makes it wrap round that box? Because when I'm using sendFrame126, the text just carries on along one line. I was thinking it was a seperate id for each line but I've been through about 40 different ids and none of them seem to be working.
